mapper.insert: insert into db_productclass (SEQUENCEID, CLASSNAME, AVGSELLNUM1, AVGSELLNUM2, OPER, OPERTIME, RESERVE1, RESERVE2, RESERVE3, RESERVE4, RESERVE5) values (#{sequenceid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{classname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{avgsellnum1,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{avgsellnum2,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{oper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{opertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{reserve1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reserve2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reserve3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reserve4,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{reserve5,jdbcType=DECIMAL})
mapper.update: update db_productclass set CLASSNAME = #{classname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AVGSELLNUM1 = #{avgsellnum1,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, AVGSELLNUM2 = #{avgsellnum2,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, OPER = #{oper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPERTIME = #{opertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, RESERVE1 = #{reserve1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RESERVE2 = #{reserve2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RESERVE3 = #{reserve3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RESERVE4 = #{reserve4,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, RESERVE5 = #{reserve5,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where SEQUENCEID = #{sequenceid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select SEQUENCEID, CLASSNAME, AVGSELLNUM1, AVGSELLNUM2, OPER, OPERTIME, RESERVE1, RESERVE2, RESERVE3, RESERVE4, RESERVE5 from db_productclass where SEQUENCEID = #{sequenceid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select SEQUENCEID, CLASSNAME, AVGSELLNUM1, AVGSELLNUM2, OPER, OPERTIME, RESERVE1, RESERVE2, RESERVE3, RESERVE4, RESERVE5 from db_productclass
